name: Keep the fire alive (RilleGames)
description:
Controlls:

Move with Left / Right arrow or A / D

Jump with Up arrow or W

Pick up / Drop / Use  items with Space

Mute music with M

There is only one fire remaining in the world, and it is your job to Keep it alive! You do so by feeding it with wood from the nearby forest. Do not chop down all the trees, because then no new trees will grow.

When the rain comes, it's good to have a hot burning fire, and lots of dry firewood under the roof. 

And make sure you do not burn your house down!
